Details:
* This role is used to configure the Kubernetes worker nodes on service cluster. This role should not have same group as ``kube_node`` role.

* The nodes included in this role will have the necessary tools and configurations to configure and run Kubernetes worker on service cluster.

* ``service_kube_node`` role: Service Cluster Kubernetes worker node groups can be provided in this role.
    
     ::

          - name: "service_kube_node"
             groups:
                - grp0
                - grp1
